title: Association Detector Visualization
description: Interactive MicroSim for comparing conditional distributions using side-by-side 100% stacked bar charts. Students edit a two-way table and observe how differences in conditional distributions indicate association between categorical variables.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Statistics
Categorical Data
Association
Conditional Distribution
Two-Way Tables

educational.learningObjective: Students will compare conditional distributions visually and describe evidence for association between categorical variables.

controls.description: Load example data showing strong association between variables

controls.description: Load example data showing no association (identical distributions)

controls.description: Load example data showing moderate association
